title: Drawing, "Project for a door knocker", 1910–15
medium: Pencil, yellow crayon, Chinese black with blue ink, paper
inscribed: Marked corresponding to C with: B
description: A bow is fastened to the sides of an ovoidal tablet, showing the beginning of a name: George C. The middle of the ring lies on the end of a spur growing from the bottom center of the tablet.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Project for a door knocker", 1910–15.Pencil, yellow crayon, Chinese black with blue ink, paper. 1939-84-40-d.
